ACK 81f81b27d88dc438fb08bda68844b752ff793991\n\nTested that the resulting guix build does use the tag name as the version rather than the commit hash. Agree that this should be backported.

Sorry, I'm NACK on this based on my understanding.\n\nIt would seem that `./autogen.sh` and `./configure` both modify their physical parent directory, even when executed from another directory. This seems like a bad idea because we'll have all `HOST`s modifying the same parent directory when configuring/autoreconf-ing, which seems fragile and is a recipe for broken builds in the future or non-re
Agree with Carl, that this doesn't seem like the right solution. We should look at #22680 instead.
